long_description:
Upon entering there are a dozen statues standing and kneeling in this room, each creating several shadows across the room as faint light filters in from all corners of the ceiling.  In between the 2 statues in the center are a black tome and a red tome, stood up on it's own on the floor.

There is a door on the east end of the corridor.  There is a door on the west end of the corridor.  There is a passageway on the south end of the corridor.
short_description:
Room covered in shadows and statues, containing a black and red tome.
There is a door(exit) on the west, a door(exit) on the east end, and a passageway(exit) on the south end of the corridor.

Black Tome.name: Black Tome
Black Tome.description: This black tome changes something for the hero.

Red Tome.name: Red Tome
Red Tome.description: This red tome presents something to the hero.
